verification.name: Verification
verification.desc: Required to join the Eagle Esports Discord Server.

questions.question: What is your Name? (First and Last)
Have you submitted your Permission Slip?
Which teams would you like to join? A Full list is available here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eJzEyEiQxKG3mGw3kEZ3pcJMjJcYuAW1/view
